com.tinmegali.security.mcipher - package com.tinmegali.security.mcipher

D

decode(String) - Static method in class com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MCipherUtils
Utility method to decode a String to a byte array
decrypt(String, byte[]) - Method in class com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MDecryptor
Decrypt a given byte array, returning a decrypted String.
decryptLargeData(String, byte[], Context) - Method in class com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MDecryptor
Uses AES algorithm to decrypt large chunks of data.
DecryptorException - Exception in com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions
An 'wrapper' Exception thrown by decryption operations, that wraps it up numerous Exception that can be thrown by the MDecryptor.decryptData(byte[], Cipher) and MDecryptor.decryptLargeData(String, byte[], Context) The Throwable.getMessage() holds an message, containing the original Exception, that you can fetch it with Throwable.getCause()
DecryptorException(String) - Constructor for exception com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions.DecryptorException
 
DecryptorException(String, Exception) - Constructor for exception com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions.DecryptorException
 

E

encodeToStr(byte[]) - Static method in class com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MCipherUtils
Utility method to encode a byte array to an String
encrypt(String, String, Context) - Method in class com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MEncryptor
Encrypt a given String using an appropriate algorithm RSA or AES according to the Android version used.
encryptLargeData(String, String, Context) - Method in class com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.MEncryptor
Uses AES algorithm to encrypt large chunks of data.
EncryptorException - Exception in com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions
An 'wrapper' Exception thrown by encryption operations, that wraps it up numerous Exception that can be thrown by the MEncryptor.encryptData(byte[], Cipher) method.
EncryptorException(String) - Constructor for exception com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions.EncryptorException
 
EncryptorException(String, Exception) - Constructor for exception com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions.EncryptorException
